title: I got PERMAN BAN because this? RIOT pls I spend all time on this shit and you ban me?
body:
Game 1
BalanceFlood: fake leash
BalanceFlood: top fucked up
BalanceFlood: bot no sums
BalanceFlood: attention
BalanceFlood: holy shit
BalanceFlood: now they are just camping
BalanceFlood: jeez
BalanceFlood: mys
BalanceFlood: kys
BalanceFlood: you are so bad
BalanceFlood: you fucking boosted
BalanceFlood: kys
BalanceFlood: gg

replies.body: Twice you told someone to kill themselves in addition to calling them boosted for their assumingly poor play. Death wishes fall under the zero tolerance policy and are subject to a 2week ban for the first offense. Since you already had a 2week ban you were given a permaban for the lack of behavior improvement. No excuses, the ban was deserved.
Told someone to end his life over a videogame. Guessing you had a 14 day ban before?
Another kys situation. Its like telling your account to kill its self.
No No guys he meant "keep yourself safe" !!!!!!!! what a guy.
Grow up and realize that you made a huge mistake pissing off society.
